entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.0
entry.content:
Initial release

View the announcement article : https://zaneops.dev/changelog/announcing-v1

Credits

  • Thanks to @mo-cherif for his contributions to this project

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/commits/v1

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes :

  • üêõ fix bug with SSL certificates check endpoint by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/381

other changes

  • fix: use v1.0 in the .env file by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/377
  • fix: link to installation steps in the readme by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: bug with service metrics not collected correctly by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/383

Other changes

  • chore: use v1 for the default version instead of v1.0 by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/382

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2
